website_summaries.verdict: With the added waterproof protection, the Moko lanyards are an essential vacation tool.
pros: Lanyard is made from strong materials with a convenient clip to quickly detach phone
Safely take photos near and under the water without damaging your phone
Spacious pouch has plenty of additional room for credit cards and ID
cons: Lanyard is on the shorter side

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to test the product and when I removed the bath tissue one case had leaked causing the entire tissue to be wet and the other had just leaked slightly causing the edges of the tissue to be wet in spots. The product has lots of positive reviews so I was very hopeful this would be perfect to take to the beach, snorkeling, etc., but it’s definitely not worth the risk of needing to replace an expensive iPhone. TEST THE PRODUCT BEFORE USING!! For what it’s worth, no complaints on being able to use touch screen and the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anna W

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE EVER!!!!😍
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST WATERPROOF PHONE CASE EVER!!!! I have always taken a water camera on Vacation, until to his year. I bought this case to try because my phone camera is so much better. This is the BEST PURCHASE I have ever made! It worked like a Charm... I was a little Leary at first, but I tested it out at home before & not a drop of water got in! So, don't hesitate Buy This for all your Pool Pics & Beach!!! BEST PRODUCT & VALUE U WILL BUY!😍
customer_reviews.author: Shopkins

customer_reviews.title: No issues at all
customer_reviews.text: Used it at the waterpark in the lazy river and tubing and so far so good.. we first tested it out in a bucket of water submerged for an hour before we left.the photo attached is in the pouch, I was able to take videos and even talk on the phone.i have an s9 and it fit with the case on and all of our membership cards and atm card 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: agentBlazin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these protectors before a trip, having looked at the ratings. While I didn't submerge the container in water, I did wear it around my neck while walking in the ocean. The holder was easy to navigate and I could sign into my phone easily. I even took pictures through it! You can't have any case thicker than a skin, but it does a great job. I let a friend have the other one, and she loved her's too! Great value. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof as Described!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to the beach and it was great! Water tested it before hand and left it in the sink for 30minutes at the same time and it didn't catch any water in it. Used it in the ocean and got recordings of little fishes! No water came through at all, and there were some tough waves hitting it at times.
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well under water
customer_reviews.text: These helped me and my siblings record videos of coral reefs underwater in the Caribbean. My only complaint is that it sometimes got air inside and became foggy (like goggles do). However, it got the job done and was cheap, so I recommend it. I was thinking of getting a waterproof Go Pro but since this product helped me to use my phone for underwater videos, I decided against it. Saved me a ton of bucks and I still got the results I wanted (simple videos from my vacation).
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this! I went scuba diving in Bonaire and bought this product to take pictures on my dives. The deepest I went was to about 90 feet and it worked perfectly. My phone never got wet and took great photos! Dive shops there were selling a product very similar for a minimum of $25 jus for one. Just remember when diving your touch screen won’t work so put your phone in camera mode before diving and take pictures with the volume button. Best purchase I’ve made in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need these if you are on a beach vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect as long as you don’t open it near or in the water. Play around with the clasps before entering water! I have used these for two years now!!!! I will continue to use these on my beach vacations!!! I can fit room key and some dollar bills for tipping people as well. It’s perfect! The two pack is great because after a while they get foggy because it’s water and plastic. So halfway through the week, I switch out the pouch. I’m sure you could clean it. But I didn’t want to!
customer_reviews.author: htravis

customer_reviews.title: But easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: These WERE definitely waterproof, but I have to take off a star, because I couldn't use the touch screen part of my iPhone underwater. Based off what I've read on the internet, the water pushing against your screen will make the iPhone think it's a multi-touch situation, and it won't respond to your fingers. But easy to carry, and I didn't have to worry at all about my phone getting wet (even after swimming with it for half an hour).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly waterproof. Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. Took the phone into the lake and the Blue Lagoon in Iceland and no issues at all. I will say that you have to put the phone in and just keep it closed. My friend kept taking her phone in and out and then moisture gets trapped inside and it doesn’t work as well. But I put my phone in and left it alone, the touch screen worked great, my pictures came out great and it stayed 100% dry.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A.

customer_reviews.title: These work great!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great!!! Bought one for me and two more for my friends for our trip to Florida. I was so excited to use it and it worked great! No water got in whatsoever. I was swimming in the ocean and taking pictures on my phone, it was awesome! Plus it was nice to carry around my neck when we were walking around. My touch screen worked just fine. Saved my phone from sand and water. I have a iPhone 7
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not For Daily Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I drop my phone every single day. I dropped it in the tub, in the toilet, on the stairs, in the snow, in a puddle. I was buying a new phone every 3 months and I was running out of booze money. This was my savior. Daily use will make this thing's screen cloudy, and it will pop holes in the seams. The plastic gets brittle in the cold, and though it is usually responsive enough, it does not work well with texting gloves. Not the best product, but if I'm honest I'll probably buy another one when I break the one I have.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Smith

customer_reviews.title: It was nearly impossible to take a phone while submerged and the seam split on the second use.
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof pouch was great for taking pictures in tide pools but not while swimming. It was nearly impossible to push the button or get the screen to snap a picture while submerged. Also, the seam split very quickly and it was no longer waterproof during the second use. If you're going on vacation or want to make sure you're phone doesn't get wet I'd suggest something a bit sturdier. Also, I have a big phone and it was hard to get the phone into it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPhone 11 and his LG Thinq (Probably the biggest phone that could fit). Completely water resistant and photos come out well. Don’t try running with the arm band, I broke mine doing that.
customer_reviews.author: CookieBandit

customer_reviews.title: it actually works
customer_reviews.text: it actually does work well..does not get water in your phone at all and its enough room to put ur Credit cards and ID in the pouch as well.. it takes clear pictures even under water. I highly recommend this waterproof phone case
customer_reviews.author: DivaGaming247

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These will not fit a Samsung Galaxy 8+ with a protective case (Otter Box) installed, too tight. Also when ordered it said that it included a neck lanyard but not the case. Also the mechanism to open and close the case is difficult to operate. Do not buy! Also, when contacting Amazon Customer Service they said that they had an alternate that should work and would send it out, no need to return the other case. Now I get an email requesting me to send the original back or I would be charged for it! Gave the originals away, now I have to try to get them back. Way to Go Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Good Value/No Leaks in Cabo San Lucas
customer_reviews.text: The case was really easy to use and never leaked on me. The only thing I noticed that I went snorkeling and when I attempted to use it under water, it didn't really detect my finger touching the screen. Overall, it's a great water proof case, which is what it's designed for. If you're going to use it under water, you'll have a few challenges. All in All, it's a great value and does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: William Dean Euton

customer_reviews.title: Using with Samsung Note 5 & Samsung s6
customer_reviews.text: These work really good. I dont have to take off my case either. I have used it tubing down the river, in the swimming pool, and at the lake a couple of times. The ONLY 2 ISSUES i have are 1) it doesnt read my fingerprint to unlock phone so change to an easy PIN while using. 2) it doesnt let me use my phone underwater. It doesnt read that i am touching the screen. Took off 1 star because it advertised it works underwater but other than that it keeps my phone dry and thats what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps phone dry
customer_reviews.text: Needed something waterproof fast for my job because they were sending me tubing with students. The case itself is great, but using your phone through it takes a little getting used to. The lanyard is basically a ribbon which I don’t like at all. For the price, I don’t mind buying a replacement. Was very effective for what I needed since I have to keep my phone on me at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E. Solovey

customer_reviews.title: Tested
customer_reviews.text: When we received the product, I tested it underwater as the instructions stated, and happy to say, no leaks at all. We are going on vacation to a water park and so excited that we can now take our phone with us all the way!
customer_reviews.author: sandi s

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work great, I've used it when I was swimming under the water and it actually worked, my phone wasn't wet at all and I could still use my phone under water. It was kinda hard to touch the screen i think it was just because the water was messing with the sensors or something.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to augment my phone’s water resistance. My wallet style case does not fit in the pouch, but that’s just a small inconvenience; I can take my phone out of its case and it works just fine. So far I’ve only tested the pouches, and used one in the shower to test it in a real scenario. I had only a little trouble with the touch screen, but again, it was only a little bit. So far these pouches have proven to be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on a fishing trip and some mello kayaking. I wouldn't trust it to totally submerge my phone in water but good if you plan on being splashed a little bit. It was a little hard to swipe around the screen but it works. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked really good out in river!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my bf used these for our phones for the Laughlin regatta and they worked really well! I wore mine around my neck the whole time and it dipped into the river a few times throughout the whole 4.5 hours we were out there and it didn’t get any water in it whatsoever. It was super easy for me to still Snapchat and take pictures and videos while my phone was in the case so the touchscreen part was perfect. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things!!! We bought them a few years back and took them snorkeling and they were fantastic. We bought new ones for our summer vacation this year. We took our phones to an amusement park yesterday in the rain and it worked great. We put our phones, IDs and cash in them. It’s perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I can not easily slide my phone in and out!! Almost impossible especially when it gets warm! I have a droid phone! Would NOT buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Black

customer_reviews.title: No pictures of our snorkeling outing.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not allow my cell phone (Samsung S9 Plus) to take pictures underwater. Another gentleman who also bought this product had the same issue with his cell phone (iPhone 8). Product did not leak which was a positive.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Protect your investment, buy a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.text: After putting the phone in the Moko waterproof pouch, I was hesitant to submerse it in water. Swimming in pools and going on water slides, the pouch was accidentally submerged in water. I’m glad I picked Moko. It is very safe. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Rafik G.

customer_reviews.title: Amusement Park Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our Disneyland trip so we could ride the water rides and not worry about our phones getting wet or flying out of our pockets. It’s our go to for any amusement park day!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Stigall

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! Everyone at the waterpark was asking where we ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously you must buy these! We did water test before actually putting our phones in! We have tons of underwater shots and on water slides and such! I purchased a life proof case for my iPhone a while back and returned it because my phone was wet. This product is amazing! Everyone at the waterpark was asking where we purchased these from. We had one for everyone in the family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used it sturgeon fishing on the Columbia river in some rough conditions and phone stayed dry and was still able to take pics and videos.
customer_reviews.author: christopher williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for our waterpark trip. Allowed me to take pictures and videos of the kids all while keep my phone dry. I hung it around my neck with no worries. This was actually my second time purchasing them. Let someone borrow the last one and never got it back. Floated the river with that one and perfect for that trip too.
customer_reviews.author: M.Cantu

customer_reviews.title: ... decided to purchase these waterproof pouches and I'm so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to purchase these waterproof pouches and I'm so happy I did. I did the test with the paper towels and after several hours under water they were still dried. Me and my son used them this past weekend at the waterpark and our phones stayed completely dry even with being under water most of the day. All the pictures that we took came out crystal clear. The only thing I will warn people on is if you have a huge phone I wouldn't recommend this pouch. I have a 6 inch display and had to take my case off for it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Glover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Splashtown. They held up perfect underwater. No leakage!!! The price is also very good for a 2 pack. Me and my husband enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: PinkQueen👑

customer_reviews.title: Great seal
customer_reviews.text: I really had a good experience with this case.. took it hiking and got wet, no problem.. I went scuba-diving with it and didn’t experience any leaks
customer_reviews.author: ZR

customer_reviews.title: Good case to protect from elements at beach
customer_reviews.text: Can use phone while in case. Even took a decent picture while inside case. One of two had a slight dampness inside when tested for leakage .. left in water 2-3 hours. Would not use underwater, but if phone in case dropped in water and quickly retrieved, phone would be dry. Test for short and long term use in water before using.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Protected our phone
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our cruise! My son also took a video while jumping into a pool. Didn't hinder the quality of pictures or videos. Phones stayed dry and it was easy to put in or take out of the pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One good, one bad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for snorkeling on a Caribbean cruise trip. One was tested before snorkeling and did not leak then or during snorkeling. The other was not tested and leaked. 🙁 Luckily, we checked and found the leakage before the phone was damaged. There was enough water in the pouch to pour out.
customer_reviews.author: Open Minded Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida and go to the beach almost daily. These cases are a great buy and work. Definitely test yours out first just as the directions in the packaging implies. If I will trust it to house my Note 5, you know it's good!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Farley

customer_reviews.title: Forgot them for my trip!!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally left them so it didn't go on my trip. Maybe I can make a review later
customer_reviews.author: Connye Varner

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been a good product...
customer_reviews.text: This 2-Pack deal was perfect, one for my wife and one for myself. We recently went on vacation and we used these at the pool and the beach. I haven't taken pictures underwater, but it has protected my cell from normal water splashes. So far it's been a good product...
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. They really do take clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They really do take clear pictures. Much better than some $40 waterproof cases purchased at the water parks and hotel pools.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great case if you're clumsy around the water!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take my phone down the river on a floating trip. They worked great. We took a ton of pictures that came out very clear, as if there was no case on the phone at all. I even fell in the water at one point and not a drop of water got into the case!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Worked hreat for our trip. Took lots of photos through the pouch. Kids used them too, no problems, no lost phones.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Troiano

customer_reviews.title: It kept our phone dry to the max
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it wasn't wet in the inside. No sand got in my phone it just perfect for me. I play under the water and it was great to take pictures as well
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Water resistant and was a great accessory for our cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Pouliasis

customer_reviews.title: So your phone isn't as useful for taking photos in the water
customer_reviews.text: It does keep your device dry. But after a few days of use the clear case / plastic see through window becomes cloudy. So your phone isn't as useful for taking photos in the water. But if your main goal is just to keep it dry, this will do the job. My Google Nexus 6P just barely fits inside without a case on it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Culbreath

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: My case cramps the touchscreen usage for some reason & have to use a different technique for it to work. The lanyard is uncomfortable on my neck, so I changed it.
customer_reviews.author: CoAsTaLReigN

customer_reviews.title: Did the job well
customer_reviews.text: Record under water with good quality.. only thing it's hard to take pics under water, plastic gets stuck to plastic. Best if you record outside water and then submerge.
customer_reviews.author: Jose T.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a trip to Hawaii, we used them tubing, canoeing, and swimming by waterfalls. My phone stayed dry, and was able to capture pictures through the case. My boyfriend folded his in half and used it for money, IDs and room cards.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible merchandise. My phone was ruined!
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust it. I was on vacation in Greece and I went swimming with one of the cases. Before I went swimming I made sure that everything was securely closed. I don't know what happened but when I got out of the water one of the cases had water in it. My phone was flooded and I was forced to purchase a new one. Be careful when purchasing this merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected, but I didn't expect that lol.. they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A. Jacky

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: it LEAKED AND MY PHONE IS NOW DEAD SO DONT BUY THIS NOW BECAUSE I HAVE TO GET A NEW PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Sassybug

customer_reviews.title: These worked great! We used them while snorkeling in the Caribbean ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great! We used them while snorkeling in the Caribbean and were able to take pictures under water. I fit my Galaxy S9 with Otterbox in it plus my ID, cards and cash. Everything stayed dry and safe.
customer_reviews.author: bonniechic

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit with a simple case on it when I think it stated it would. I have changed by review of this product because the vendor reached out to me and made it right. I really appreciate their concern for the issue. This is what you call making the customer happy
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: If you dont want your phone anymore, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If you dont want your phone anymore, buy it! My phone got water damage and it didn't want to turn on anyone. Plus I wanted to take photo or video under water and I wasn't able to.
customer_reviews.author: Nalleli Villalvazo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your phone dry and you can still use your touch screen and camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use often. Walking my dogs, kayaking, and took to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Marie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be perfect for our vacation. They protected our phones and were easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl711

customer_reviews.title: My wife Love it ~~~~~~~~~~
customer_reviews.text: Work Fine For my First Visit in Mexico !! My wife Love it . Thank You
customer_reviews.author: PlayBoyEddie

customer_reviews.title: Great was after protection
customer_reviews.text: Great case for water protection. The materiacannot withstand sun exposure for too long, but it still keep your phone protected. It fit my Samsung Note 8 without its case and my moms iPhone 8 Plus with her slim case on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great swimming pics
customer_reviews.text: I used this case in the pool. At the pool area 6 hours one day, in pool more than out. I had my iPhone in this case around my neck with the case floating in the pool. Had lots of great pics. Absolutely no moisture to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Darla K.

customer_reviews.title: These worked great! But after only using 2 times they both got leaks in them and filled with water🙈
customer_reviews.text: These worked great at first. Used them 2 times then when we just recently tried to use them for the 3rd time they both had leaks in them and filled with water🙈 luckily our phones are okay but kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: kristin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it would Be a great waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my iPhone 6s Plus. Too tight and too Hard to put in case. Otherwise it would Be a great waterproof case
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of product is very bad. It ripped when I was excited and try to use it. I waisted my money. The product described differently and I get the different quality of product. So new buyer should be careful before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I can fully submerge my phone in the pool with no water leaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The touchscreen underwater works pretty good as well
customer_reviews.text: Used it for snorkeling for my iPhone 6s Plus in Catalina. Bought it because it came with 2, his and hers basically. Doesn't fit with a case, but not even an issue. Tried the tissue test beforehand and tissue was completely dry after being submerged for 2 hours. Went snorkeling for 2 hours and my phone was completely dry with clear pictures taken! The touchscreen underwater works pretty good as well. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: By far the best waterproof case available!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best waterproof case you can get. I ordered these last minute for our trip to the beach. They arrived quickly and we used them everyday. My phone got thrown in the sand and water, it was sand free and dry when I got it out. We didn't use the arm strap but used the lanyard. The lanyard was definitely useful for all the times I was afraid I would drop my phone. Would definitely recommend to anyone that wants to protect their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought for use at the beach in Mexico and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought for use at the beach in Mexico and it worked. Kept my phone dry as I took it in the water for pictures. Locks are a little hard to deal with, but I suppose that's what keeps the phone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it in water use it in the Operating room at work so I can wipe it down after work.
customer_reviews.author: maura

customer_reviews.title: Mine leaked very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Mine leaked very disappointed in this product, well I was on vacation before I went to go snorkeling I found one that floats and works and a little more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: They do the job but it is SOOO hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but it is SOOO hard to get your phone out of these once you put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It kept my phone totally dry while snorkeling. However my phone Samsung Galaxy S7 edge would NOT take photos while submerged. Once above water it did great. Attached photos were taken while my phone was in the pouch, they are very clear. Shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Costa

customer_reviews.title: Got here super quickly and exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Got here super quickly and exactly as pictured. Great for vacation even came with two straps to use it in different ways. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these cases
customer_reviews.text: Omg, love these cases. Took it to Anna Marie Island in Florida and to Destin. No water touched my iPhone 7plus. The only downside is the case is so durable, the buttons on my screen doesn't work when I touch it on the outside of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Used on a kayaking trip. Not a single leak!
customer_reviews.author: Skiddlywinks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They have kept our phones from getting wet while at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gregg

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at how well this worked
customer_reviews.text: I wore this a few times at the local amusement park and it protected my phone. I was amazed at how well this worked.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: I got great video while at great wolf lodge in the water ...
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal!! I got great video while at great wolf lodge in the water park, going down the raft rides, my sons face lights up everytime he sees them! Would recommend these to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: English Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are large and can fit even my I phone 6 plus
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a trip for zip line so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip for zip line so it hang on my neck ,worked well . I have not try it under water yet
customer_reviews.author: Wen Ya Wu

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Put my phone in it to go tubing. Worked great. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this was able to jet ski, go on water slides and dive in the pool while catching it on camera! No leaks! Before using the product i tested it putting a rock and paper towel in the cases and placed them in my daughter's mini pool for 2 hours and no water got in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used them yet but did put tissue in ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but did put tissue in them and soaked in water. It remained dry so I don't expert any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: No issues ...kept our phones dry and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Overall ---works great. Does its job. It's a little hard to work under water but that's no big deal. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ilia Cappello

customer_reviews.title: Ordered them for me and my husband for our miami ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for me and my husband for our miami trip and our phones survived all the water falls! Me and my husband also fell off our jetski and our phones were deeply submerged under water and they still made it out! (:
customer_reviews.author: haneen kiswani

customer_reviews.title: Nonfunctional 7S Home Button is Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It fits my iphone 7s well enough but the HOME BUTTON is NOT FUNCTIONAL. I probably would have kept searching for a case if I realized that beforehand. Now I see that it is buried in the product info and other owners have made similar comments (ooops). I was just so excited about the good price for two case. It's still a good purchase since my husband can use one for his Samsung and I can still protect my iPhone from water when we take the kids swimming this summer.

customer_reviews.text: Love love love these. I have used them at the beach, four wheeler riding, and to float a river for 9 hours. No water seeps in and the camera works great.

product_meta.title: MoKo Waterproof Phone Pouch [2 Pack], Underwater Cellphone Case Dry Bag with Lanyard Armband Compatible with iPhone 11/11 Pro Max, X/Xs/Xr/Xs Max, 8/7/6s Plus, Galaxy S10/S9 Plus, S10e, S20, Note 10
feature_bullets: UNIVERSAL SIZE - Fits devices up to 6.5 inch diagonal (without rugged case) with extra space for credit card, ID, cash, coins. Easy access for beach, swimming, fishing, sailing, kayaking, snorkeling and water park activities.
IPX8 CERTIFIED - Superior water-resistant protection up to 98 feet (30 meters), offers waterproof / snowproof / dirtproof protection for your device.
EASY OPERATION - Slim transparent cover allows full touch screen functionality on photography, videography or checking emails even underwater.
FULL PROTECTION - Lightweight Polyvinyl chloride (PVC) casing with a simple snap and lock access, safeguard your device against water, snow, dust and dirt.
DUAL FUNCTION - Exquisite design with a detachable lanyard for hanging around neck freely and an adjustable armband for attaching to arm firmly.
